snippet: Minnesota retained a former chief justice and a former federal attorney to look into Kluwe’s charges that he was released because he supports gay marriage.
abstract: NFL Roundup; Minnesota Vikings retain former Minnesota Supreme Court chief justice Eric Magnuson and former federal trial lawyer Chris Madel to conduct investigation into punter Chris Kluwe’s allegations that he was released from the team because of his support of same-sex marriage; other football news noted.
lead_paragraph: Minnesota retained a former chief justice and a former federal attorney to look into Kluwe’s charges that he was released because he supports gay marriage.

headline.main: Vikings to Investigate Punter Chris Kluwe’s Claim of Homophobia
headline.print_headline: Vikings Investigating Claims By Punter of Homophobia

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
keywords.name: subject
